name: Scripps Spelling Bee
overview: Be the Best You Can Bee! Increase your child's vocabulary and improve your child's grades with the Scripps Spelling Bee game! Special Features: • Input your child's school spelling words to practice for this week's test.• Play 8 puzzling mini-games. Spelling has never been more fun!• Step up to the microphone to ask for Merriam-Webster audio pronunciations of thousands of challenging words.
